DB_URL.title: DB_URL
DB_URL.description: URL for external DB, including port, e.g. 'http://host.docker.internal:9000' (without quotes).

DB_ACCESS_TOKEN.title: DB_ACCESS_TOKEN
DB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token (API KEY) for external DB. Defaults to empty string.

DB_ORGANIZATION_IDENTIFIER.title: DB_ORGANIZATION_IDENTIFIER
DB_ORGANIZATION_IDENTIFIER.description: Identifier for an organisation. Defaults to KAT organization code.

DB_ENDPOINT_FORMAT.title: DB_ENDPOINT_FORMAT
DB_ENDPOINT_FORMAT.description: Python format string with all variables above (optionally empty). E.g. '{DB_URL}/api/v1/participants/assets/{DB_ORGANIZATION_IDENTIFIER}?access_token={DB_ACCESS_TOKEN}' (without quotes)
